channel.title: Big Question, to start or?
channel.description:
Hi
Before i buy Axoloti CORE. I have question. When i create synth or any audio device in Axoloti + my aditional PCB boards, components, pots, display etc... Let say Axoloti core will be only "main" engine. "Starting point"
So question is: Can i put my name on synth and sale to others. Like my product? It will be logical because i pay for Axoloti core for use. I want to know is that possible? Or is there another way? Or similar project like Axoloti core? I dont want start working if is not possible.
Thank you all @ Axoloti Community

item.title: Big Question, to start or?
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

ah, you need to be trust level 1 (which requires a few more posts etc) to be able to send PMs , ive bumped you up to level 1 manually.

Read full topic

item.title: Big Question, to start or?
item.dc:creator: @sint sint
item.description:
@sint wrote:


I dont know why but i cant see PM in your profile.
Can you send me PM that way i can replay to you.
Sorry for bordering
Thank you

Read full topic

item.title: Big Question, to start or?
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

click on a users icon, or mention in a post, and then the profile is shown, with a 'message' button for PM.

Read full topic

item.title: Big Question, to start or?
item.dc:creator: @sint sint
item.description:
@sint wrote:

Thank you dear thetechnobear.

I want to send you PM, but i dont know where is PM option?

Read full topic

item.title: Big Question, to start or?
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

If you are considering using Axoloti commercially, it would be best to discuss this with @Johannes directly... anything anyone else says is just an 'opinion', also if your shipping lots of units, then you'll need to be able get a supply of Axoloti from Johannes as you sell units.

(Id recommend you PM him, so you can discuss plans in details with him, which might not be appropriate in a public forum)

Read full topic

item.title: Big Question, to start or?
item.dc:creator: @sint sint
item.description:
@sint wrote:

Hi

Before i buy Axoloti CORE.
I have question. When i create synth or any audio device in Axoloti
+ my aditional PCB boards, components, pots, display etc...
Let say Axoloti core will be only "main" engine. "Starting point"

So question is: Can i put my name on synth and sale to others. Like my product? It will be logical because i pay for Axoloti core for use.
I want to know is that possible?
Or is there another way? Or similar project like Axoloti core?
I dont want start working if is not possible.

Thank you all @ Axoloti Community

Read full topic
